title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 142-2.9 - Basis of wage payment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 142-2.9 - Basis of wage payment

State Regulations

The minimum and overtime wage provided by this Part
shall be required for each week of work, regardless of the frequency of
payment, whether the wage is on a commission, bonus, piece rate, or any other
basis. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
142-2.9

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
